sources.name: United Nations Population Division (Rev 2015) – Population Growth
sources.description:
Data provider United Nations Population Division


Description Population Growth in % (average over 5 year interval ending with the given year). Values post 2015 are the UN projections from the Mid-Variant
Linkhttp://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/dataset/index.shtml
Retrieved4 Feb

Additional information

Years refer to the average over the preceding 5 year interval (1955 refers to the period 1950 to 1955 etc.)

variables.name: United Nations Population Division (Rev 2015) – Population Growth
